purpose: Validation sample set for stream mode + millisecond timestamp upgrade

files.batch_trades_with_rpc.csv: Batch mode with --rpc-url; timestamp_ms populated from block_ts*1000+log_index, server_received_ms empty.
files.stream_trades_live.csv: Realtime stream mode; timestamp_ms and server_received_ms both populated.
files.stream_ws_push.jsonl: Local websocket payload sample (one JSON row per push).
